sentences: He is the lead singer of the Richmond, Virginia-based punk rock band Avail.

He is the lead singer of the Richmond, Virginia-based punk rock band Avail. In addition to performing with Avail, he was the bass guitarist in the Richmond-based folk punk band (Young) Pioneers from 1994 to 1995.
Barry has been performing folk music on his own since 2004.
Frank Turner / Tim Barry – Split EP (October 13, 2009)
Live (featuring Tim Barry and La Par Force) – 2006
